scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model in a consumer banking context.  The attacker leverages carefully crafted inputs to infer protected attributes like income and credit score, violating privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Determine the accuracy of the deployed customer churn prediction model.
enterprise_context: Consumer Banking:  A large bank uses a machine learning model to predict customer churn based on a variety of anonymized and pseudonymized customer data points.  The model is exposed via a public API for internal use and limited external access by approved partners.
